scripts.imagemin: imagemin src/images/* -o dist/images && imagemin src/images/puppy_love/* -o dist/images/puppy_love
scripts.usemin: usemin src/puppy-love.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/puppy-love.html && usemin src/beatrix-potter.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/beatrix-potter.html && usemin src/happy-books.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/happy-books.html && usemin src/index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run imagemin && npm run copyfonts && npm run usemin && webpack
